description: A simple chain to prompt a large language model

properties.name: text
properties.placeholder: e.g. Hello, how can you help me?

properties.name: messages
properties.displayName: Chat Messages (if Using a Chat Model)

properties.name: Image (Binary)
properties.description: Process the binary input from the previous node

properties.name: Image (URL)
properties.description: Process the image from the specified URL

properties.name: binaryImageDataKey
properties.description: The name of the field in the chainâ€™s input that contains the binary image file to be processed

properties.name: imageUrl
properties.description: URL to the image to be processed

properties.name: imageDetail
properties.description: Control how the model processes the image and generates its textual understanding

properties.name: Low
properties.description: The model will receive a low-res 512px x 512px version of the image, and represent the image with a budget of 65 tokens. This allows the API to return faster responses and consume fewer input tokens for use cases that do not require high detail.

properties.name: High
properties.description: Allows the model to see the low res image and then creates detailed crops of input images as 512px squares based on the input image size. Each of the detailed crops uses twice the token budget (65 tokens) for a total of 129 tokens.
